waste_details.reason_for_no_provision: Provided in neighbouring development site as part of overall site-wide refuse strategy.

decision_conditions: Unless otherwise stated on the approved drawings all new work or work of making good to the Listed Building shall be executed on matching material and shall be detailed to match the existing colour, profile and/or bonding.Reason: To ensure that the character, appearance and integrity of the building is not prejudiced, thereby preserving the special architectural or historic which it possesses in accordance with Section 16(2) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and ConservationAreas) Act 1990 and national guidance set out in the NPPF, and Policies CS08 and DM12 of the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Written notification of the intended start of works on site shall be sent to Heritage England, 1 Waterhouse Square, 138-142 Holborn, London, EC1N 2ST, with a copy sent to the Local Planning Authority at least seven days before the works herebyapproved are commenced.Reason: In order that Historic England and the Local Planning Authority may be given the opportunity of monitoring the progress of works on site to ensure the preservation of the special interests of the building affected by the works hereby approved in accordance with Policy DM12 (Development in a conservation Area and Affecting Heritage Assets) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Prior to the installation of any external lighting and CCTV, details of external lighting and CCTV and their associated service runs to include a full set of drawings showing the proposed fixtures in plan and elevation, including indicative route for associated service runs shall be submitted to the local planning authority for approval in writing.Reason: In order that the special architectural and historic interest of this listed building is safeguarded in accordance with Policy CS8 (Character, Heritage and Design) and Policy DM 12 (Development in a conservation Area and Affecting Heritage Assets) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years of the date of the previously approved application 19/00478/LBC dated 22/09/2016.Reason: In order to comply with section 18 of the Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990.

Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans additional detailed drawings (unless otherwise indicated below) of the following items shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to thecommencement of the relevant part of the development:a) Detailed drawings of the proposed new restaurant kitchens including theventilation systemsb) Details of the finialsc) Detailed drawings of the new lift structures -(Discharged under 17/12278/COND 04/09/2017)d) Details of new external doors and windows inserted into the existing building -(Discharged under 18/12156/COND 29/03/2018 and 18/12861/COND 21/12/2018)e) Any additional internal changes required in connection with the proposed uses. -(Discharged under 18/12156/COND 29/03/2018)All works should be carried out in accordance with the approved details (including where previously discharged as indicated above) prior to first occupation of the relevant part of the building, save for temporary accommodation which has first been agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: In order that the special architectural and historic interest of this listed building is safeguarded in accordance with Policy CS8 (Character, Heritage and Design) and Policy DM 12(Development in a conservation Area and Affecting Heritage Assets) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
description: Section 19 application to vary Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of listed building consent reference 19/00478/FUL (Section 19 application to vary condition 2 of listed building consent reference 14/13250/LBC)to provide: Design amendments for internal penetrations for building services, splice basement steel work and introducing 2no. steel columns and external soil vent pipes and WC vents through external wall.
